title:
Sure, here's a joke for you:

Why don't scientists trust atoms?

Because they make up everything!
original_prompt:
Sure! Here's a joke for you:

Why don't scientists trust atoms?

Because they make up everything!
input1: Why don't mathematicians argue with numbers? Because they always add up to the same conclusion!
input2: Why did the physicist bring a ladder to the bar? Because they heard the drinks were on the house!
input1_ans:
That's a great one! Here's another math-related joke for you:

Why was the equal sign so humble?

Because it knew it wasn't less than or greater than anyone else!

input2_ans:
That's a great one! Here's another physics-themed joke for you:

Why can't you trust an atom?

Because they make up everything!
